thought: To craft a crimson_sign, I need to craft 4 crimson_planks. To craft crimson_planks, I need to craft a crimson_stem. I have a crimson_stem at slot 44, so I will move it to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
